detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#84-103):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#91)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#95)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#97)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#98)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#100)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#101)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#102)
